Class ConversationFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.iodynelabs.toffee.ConversationFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, ConversationHandler.ConversationCallback

    public class ConversationFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
implements ConversationHandler.ConversationCallback
    The actual content of the Conversation Screen.
